  sapply(colnames(consumerPriceIndexofJapan),Nippon::zen2han)
colnames(laborforcesurvey) <- 
  sapply(colnames(laborforcesurvey),Nippon::zen2han)
objCol <- 
  c(grep('^労働力人口.+男女計.+',colnames(laborforcesurvey)),
    grep('^完全失業者.+男女計.+',colnames(laborforcesurvey)))
laborforcesurvey$`完全失業率(%):男女計:季節調整値` <-
  laborforcesurvey[,objCol[2]]/laborforcesurvey[,objCol[1]]*100

  grep(':総合$',colnames(consumerPriceIndexofJapan))
mergeData <-
  na.omit(merge(laborforcesurvey[,c(1,ncol(laborforcesurvey))], 
                consumerPriceIndexofJapan[,c(1,objCol)],by = "Date"))

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='hide'}
fun_rollingLM <- function(objDF = mergeData,rangeN = 12*5){
  resultDF <- data.frame()
  for(rrr in 1:(nrow(objDF)-rangeN+1)){
    obj <- objDF[rrr:(rrr+rangeN-1),]
    x <- obj[,2]
    y <- obj[,3]
    resultLM <- lm(y~x)
    resultDF[rrr,1] <- rrr
    resultDF[rrr,2] <- paste0(format(range(obj[,1]),'%Y-%m'),collapse = '~')
    resultDF[rrr,3] <- resultLM$coefficients[2]
    resultDF[rrr,4] <- confint(resultLM)[2]
    resultDF[rrr,5] <- confint(resultLM)[4]
    resultDF[rrr,6] <- as.character(range(obj[,1])[1])
    resultDF[rrr,7] <- as.character(range(obj[,1])[2])
    resultDF[rrr,8] <- round(summary(resultLM)$adj.r.squared,3)
    
  }
  colnames(resultDF) <- c('ID','Period','Slope','Lo 95','Hi 95','Date01','Date02','Adjusted r squared')
  return(resultDF)
}
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='hide'}
fun_plotRolling <- function(obj){
  ylim <- c(floor(min(obj[,3:5])),ceiling(max(obj[,3:5])))
  plot(obj$Slope,type='l',xlab='ID',ylab='',ylim=ylim,col='blue',lwd=2)
  lines(obj$`Lo 95`,lty=2)
  lines(obj$`Hi 95`,lty=2)
  grid(nx = NULL, ny = NULL, col = "lightgray", lty = "dotted")
  abline(h=0,col='red')
  resultMin <- obj[tail(which.min(obj$Slope),1),]
  resultMax <- obj[tail(which.max(obj$Slope),1),]
  minData <- mergeData[resultMin$Date01<=mergeData[,1] & mergeData[,1]<=resultMin$Date02,]
  maxData <- mergeData[resultMax$Date01<=mergeData[,1] & mergeData[,1]<=resultMax$Date02,]
  returnList <-
      list('minData' = minData,
           'maxData' = maxData)
  return(returnList)
}
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='hide'}
fun_lmPlot <- function(dataDF){
  x <- dataDF[,2]
  y <- dataDF[,3]
  resultLM <- lm(y~x)
  dateRange <- 
    paste0(format(range(dataDF[,1]),'%Y-%m'),collapse = ' ~ ')
  par(mar=c(5,5,4,1),family='Meiryo',font.main=1,cex.main=1.2)
  plot(x,y,type='p',pch=20,xlab=colnames(dataDF)[2],ylab=colnames(dataDF)[3],
       main=paste0(dateRange,'\nAdjusted r squared = ',round(summary(resultLM)$adj.r.squared,3)))
  grid(nx = NULL, ny = NULL, col = "lightgray", lty = "dotted")
  abline(resultLM,col='red')
}
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='asis'}
resultTable <- fun_rollingLM(objDF = mergeData,rangeN = 12*5)
resultData <- fun_plotRolling(obj = resultTable)
lastData <- mergeData[tail(resultTable$Date01,1)<=mergeData[,1],]
fun_lmPlot(dataDF = resultData$minData)
fun_lmPlot(dataDF = resultData$maxData)
fun_lmPlot(dataDF = lastData)
```
